sentences.english: There're two opinions on the determination of "stealthily substitute" cases' nature: theft and fraud.
sentences.chinese: “调包”的定性有盗窃与诈骗两种观点。

definition: to steal sb's valuable item and substitute a similar-looking but worthless item/to sell a fake for the genuine article/to palm off
lit. to steal a rafter and replace it with a column/to replace the original with a fake/to perpetrate a fraud (idiom)
to impersonate/to pose as (someone else)/to counterfeit/to palm off (a fake as a genuine)
to feign/to pretend to be/to pass oneself off as
lit. to lead away a goat while passing by (idiom)/fig. to opportunistically pocket sb's possessions and walk off
(of a thief, smuggler etc) to be caught with stolen or illegal goods/to be caught red-handed
